headline.main: N.Korean Ambassador Faces Deadline to Leave Malaysia
headline.print_headline: N.Korean Ambassador Faces Deadline to Leave Malaysia

lead_paragraph: North Korea's ambassador to Malaysia faced a deadline to leave the country Monday after authorities here declared him "persona non grata" and accused Pyongyang of trying to manipulate the investigation into the poisoning of Kim Jong Nam, the North Korean leader's half brother, at a Kuala Lumpur airport.
